name: Jam
description: JavaScript package manager - using a browser-focused and RequireJS compatible repository
notes: Jam used to use `jam.json` instead of `package.json`, until [July 2012](https://github.com/caolan/jam/commit/7242669b1fe6dec5a3830540363f14a0a60c67c8)
Jam can also be detected by using the `jam` property in a project's `package.json`
The install path for Jam can be customised in the project's `package.json`, by setting `jam.packageDir` to something other than `./jam`.
